CustomField.description: Indicates if there have been updates to the assignment that relate to timesheet creation since the last time timesheets were generated
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( tc9_et__Exclude_from_Auto_Timesheet_Creation__c = FALSE, NOT (ISBLANK( tc9_et__Last_Timesheet_Creation_Update_Date__c )), OR( ISBLANK(tc9_et__Last_Timesheet_Creation_Date__c), tc9_et__Last_Timesheet_Creation_Update_Date__c >= tc9_et__Last_Timesheet_Creation_Date__c ) ), TRUE,FALSE)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates if there have been updates to the assignment that relate to timesheet creation since the last time timesheets were generated
CustomField.label: Timesheets Pending Creation
